articles.title: Senate confirms Matt Whitaker as Trump’s ambassador to NATO - AP News
articles.description: The Senate has confirmed Matt Whitaker as President Donald Trump’s U.S. ambassador to NATO. The vote late Tuesday sends a crucial emissary to the Western alliance at a time of growing concern about the American commitment abroad. Whitaker, who had served in T…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) The Senate confirmed Matt Whitaker late Tuesday as President Donald Trumps U.S. ambassador to NATO, a crucial emissary to the Western alliance at a time of growing concern about the A… [+1564 chars]
